About: 
 
 I am a Student of Masters in Computer Science (Artificial Intelligence and Computer Vision) in University of Malaya.
 
 My passion for programming started since I was kid, I create my first game application when I 16 years old.
 
 I have done project in multiple programming language including python, C/C++, Java, PHP, HTML, CSS, JavaScript.
 
 My Area of expertise includes Full-Stack Web Development, Artificial Intelligence and Deep Learning, Computer Vision, Mobile Application ,Game Development, Graphic and Animations.
 
 I am open to any suggestion, comments, and help requests. If you like to contact me, please drop me an email at 
 
 atifahmed0276@gmail.com 
 
 P.S. Please remember me and my family in your prayers. JazakAllah Khair.

Dear Valued Users 
 Your input is very important and hold a very high value in developing better and improved applications which suites your requirements. Please feel free to provide comments, suggestions and feedback and send it to my email. 
 
 atifahmed0276@gmail.com
Problem occurred while finding location. Make sure location is correct.\n Provide more details of your location. e.g. Aal Al Bait, Damascus

Thanks you for trying out Find Me Masjid.
 
 How to Find Masjid 
 
1. You can search for masjid at any location around the world, using search box. For better result provide precise location. 
 for example 
 Umayyain Square, Damascus 
 White Chapel, London 
 
 2. You can find masjid near your location, by tapping GPS icon beside search box. 
 
 3. More information can be found by tapping icon on upper right corner.
